snippet: In a letter to employees, Douglas L. Foshee said he acted properly in negotiating the sale of the El Paso Corporation to Kinder Morgan, despite criticism from a Delaware judge.
abstract: In a letter to employees, Douglas L. Foshee said he acted properly in negotiating the sale of the El Paso Corporation to Kinder Morgan, despite criticism from a Delaware judge.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: El Paso Corp. Chief Defends His Actions in Kinder Morgan Deal
